title: A Lot like Love...a li'l like chocolate
description: "He’s a player. She knows the rules. They meet. Smile. Talk. Add each other on Facebook. Exchange BB pins. He asks her out for coffee. She agrees. Another coffee follows. So do movies, drives, moonlight walks, study dates, sneakouts, make out sessions. Shadab and Arnika.Both eighteen. Committed. In a relationship.It’s a perfectly clichéd bubblegum love story...or is it? ... For love today, comes with a ‘conditions apply’. Career. Ambition. Practicality. Different colleges. Different countries. Different aspirations.A long-distance relationship. They decide to give it a shot. Skype video calling. BBM. Lists of do’s and don’ts. Fidelity checks. Promises. They’ve planned it all out. But can love be planned? Is chocolate a safer proposition for the heart? Is cheating on your partner an offence only if your partner comes to know about it? What happens when you’re in something which is A lot like love…a li’l like chocolate???
author: Sumrit Shahi
